name: Welcome to Faraday
description:
This simple suburban town is where you grew up, it’s all you’ve ever known. It’s also the place every other town always told stories about.

Stories you know were all true…

Welcome to Faraday is a solo writing RPG that's a blend of suburban living and the horror that lives in the corner of your vision.

Use the one page document to start your journal about being a kid in Faraday who is investigating 3 different mysteries. The prompt table will slowly guide you through weeks of interactions and opportunities to get your imagination and creativity cooking.

I was tossing the following ingredients into my brain pan as I cooked this up: 'Salem's Lot, The 'Burbs, Stranger Things, Suspiria, Home Sick Pilots, Kids with Bikes, and my own childhood in the 80s riding my BMX to the milk bar.

You only need a d20, a d6, and the way and will to write out an awesome adventure.

This game was created using the Second Guess System by Gamenomicon - which is utterly brilliant in construction - and inspired by their Hard Case game - a brilliant single page of construction and genre.
